title: Find PAIN RELIEF at Awakening Balance Acupuncture!
description: We specialize in PAIN RELIEF! Through the modalities of Traditional Chinese Medicine we strive to get at the root cause of illness and imbalance.
sitename: Awakening Balance Acupuncture & Traditional Chinese Medicine
cleaned_text: at awakening balance acupuncture Welcome! Our healthcare professionals specialize in full-spectrum Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) which restores health and balance to the whole body. PAIN RELIEF is one of our top specialties at Awakening Balance Acupuncture! There is nothing that acupuncture cannot treat! Even if you have an "incurable" diagnosis, we can help you feel much better. You don't have to live with a diminished quality of life. We've had tremendous results with our patients. If you're ready to feel better, we're here to help you! Please reach out to us. We serve the greater North Denver. full-spectrum Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) which restores health and balance to the whole body.
